sources.title: Loan Shark (1952) GEORGE RAFT
sources.description:
It's FRIDAY @PizzaFLIX
Starring: George Raft, Dorothy Hart, Paul Stewart
Director: Seymour Friedman

You need a tough ex-con to infiltrate the mob and bust up its loan shark operation. Who ya gonna call? The original gangster, GEORGE RAFT. That's who.

metadata.Plot: A vicious loan shark ring has been preying on factory workers. When several workers at a tire factory suffer violence at the hands of the loan sharkers, a union leader and the factory owner try to recruit ex-con Joe Gargan to infiltrate to the gang. At first Joe does not want to get involved, but changes his mind when his brother-in-law dies at the hands of a savage loan shark hood. Joe works his way into the mob, but in order to keep his cover, Joe can't tell anyone what he is up to. This results in him being disowned by his sister and girl friend.
metadata.Actors: George Raft, Dorothy Hart, Paul Stewart
